body.p: The purpose of a moduletoc is to produce a table of content for one module on this module.

tr.td: The tags we want to build the toc for. Default is:"h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6". For instance: ",,h3" will build a toc for h3-entries only, and they will be marked (by style) as on level 3. The value: "h3" will build a toc for h3-entries only, and they will be marked (by style) as on level 1.
The number of columns we want. Default is 0, which means a "horisontal" list.
String that separates the entries. Only effective when cols=0.

body.p: Styleclass describing this PI is: wxtmoduletocn, where n is the number of columns selected( >0). See distributed std styles.
